text: Zai zaoyu buxing hou, jiaru wo shi ta changshi wo de enhui, ta bi shuo:“Zhe shi wo ying de de, wo jue bu xiangxin fuhuo de shijian hui lailin. Jishi wo bei dai dao wo de zhu nali, wo ye neng zai ta nali huode zui hao de baochou.” Wo bi jiang ba bu xinyang zhe suo zuo de gaosu tamen, wo bi jiang shi tamen changshi kuxing.
